changeSet.author: unknow
changeSet.sql: INSERT INTO parts ( brantype, brand, descr, arstat, faltpartnum, partnum) VALUES('{OEM}', '{BOSCH}', '{something}', '{NORMAL}', '{FN93428YH}', '{NMFWER93}') ON CONFLICT (partnum) DO UPDATE SET brantype = EXCLUDED.brantype, brand = EXCLUDED.brand, descr = EXCLUDED.descr, arstat = EXCLUDED.arstat, faltpartnum = EXCLUDED.faltpartnum;
